00002 #define IN_MEMORY_SORT_HEADER

00005  *            inmemsort.h

00007  *  Mon Apr  7 14:23:34 2003
00008  *  Copyright  2003  Roman Dementiev
00009  *  dementiev@mpi-sb.mpg.de
00010  ****************************************************************************/
00011 
00012 #include "stxxl/bits/namespace.h"
00013 #include "stxxl/bits/common/simple_vector.h"
00014 #include "stxxl/bits/algo/adaptor.h"
00015 #include "stxxl/bits/mng/adaptor.h"
00016 
00017 #include <algorithm>
00018 
00019 
00020 __STXXL_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
00021 
00022 template <typename ExtIterator_, typename StrictWeakOrdering_>
00023 void stl_in_memory_sort(ExtIterator_ first, ExtIterator_ last, StrictWeakOrdering_ cmp)
00024 {
00025     typedef typename ExtIterator_::vector_type::value_type value_type;
00026     typedef typename ExtIterator_::block_type block_type;
00027 
00028     STXXL_VERBOSE("stl_in_memory_sort, range: " << (last - first) );
00029     unsigned_type nblocks = last.bid() - first.bid() + (last.block_offset() ? 1 : 0);
00030     simple_vector<block_type> blocks(nblocks);
00031     simple_vector<request_ptr> reqs(nblocks);
00032     unsigned_type i;
00033 
00034     for (i = 0; i < nblocks; ++i)
00035         reqs[i] = blocks[i].read(*(first.bid() + i));
00036 
00037 
00038     wait_all(reqs.begin(), nblocks);
00039 
00040     unsigned_type last_block_correction = last.block_offset() ? (block_type::size - last.block_offset()) : 0;
00041     if (block_type::has_filler)
00042         std::sort(
00043             TwoToOneDimArrayRowAdaptor < block_type,
00044             typename block_type::value_type, block_type::size > (blocks.begin(), first.block_offset() ),
00045             TwoToOneDimArrayRowAdaptor < block_type,
00046             typename block_type::value_type, block_type::size > (blocks.begin(),
00047                                                                  nblocks * block_type::size - last_block_correction),
00048             cmp);
00049 
00050     else
00051         std::sort(blocks[0].elem + first.block_offset(),
00052                   blocks[nblocks].elem - last_block_correction, cmp);
00053 
00054 
00055     for (i = 0; i < nblocks; ++i)
00056         reqs[i] = blocks[i].write(*(first.bid() + i));
00057 
00058 
00059     wait_all(reqs.begin(), nblocks);
00060 }
00061 
00062 
00063 __STXXL_END_NAMESPACE
00064 
00065 #endif
